conbody.p:
The inventory table contains details for the important attributes of the .
Port: number of the port
Name: name of the port
Flow Control Status: indication if the flow control is active or not
Link State: status of the port link, up or down
Physical Mode: physical configuration of the port, type of port (Automatic, 10G Full, ...)
Media Type: actual capability of the interface, for example 10G-BaseSX
Physical Status: negotiated capability of the interface. If the physical mode is set to "Auto", this value is significant because it then indicates the actual negotiated capability
